skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.actions.Create
skill.description: To create or build a given work object.

parameter.name: work
parameter.description: The work to create or build.

parameter.name: instantaneously
parameter.description: If this parameter is set to 'true', the agent will decide to create and/or build the given element instantaneously, without any physical capability consideration.

feedback.name: creationActionCompleted
feedback.description: Sent once the work is done.

argument.name: work
argument.description: The work that has been built and/or crated.

feedback.name: createActionRunning
feedback.description: Sent once the work is being built.

argument.name: work
argument.description: The work that has is being currently built.
